Pre-Game Insights: Brooklyn Nets (4-4, fourth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Boston Celtics (7-2, second in the Eastern Conference).
Boston went 64-18 overall, 41-11 in Eastern Conference games and 37-4 at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Celtics averaged 120.6 points per game last season, 16.3 from the free-throw line and 49.5 from deep.
Brooklyn finished 32-50 overall, 5-11 in Atlantic Division games and 12-29 on the road a season ago.
The Nets averaged 110.4 points per game while shooting 45.6% from the field and 36.2% from 3-point range last season.
Injuries for Celtics: Kristaps Porzingis (foot), Jaylen Brown (hip).
Injuries for Nets: Bojan Bogdanovic (foot), Ben Simmons (back), Noah Clowney (hip), Day'Ron Sharpe (hamstring), Trendon Watford (hamstring).
